page.shortlink: api objects security object is current user in roles method
page.description: Checks to see if the current user is in at least one of supplied roles.

argument.name: RoleNames
argument.description: The name of the roles. The role names are separated by a comma or a space ("," or " ").

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the current user is in at least one of the specified roles; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.IsCurrentUserInRole() checks to see if the current user is in at least one of supplied roles. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
